1286 /****************************/

1294 typedef enum {
1302  DLB_ALERT_DEVICE_RESET,
1308  DLB_ALERT_DOMAIN_RESET,
1309  /* The watchdog timer fired for the specified port. This occurs if its
1310  * CQ was not serviced for a large amount of time, likely indicating a hung
1311  * thread. The watchdog timer must be enabled via the kernel driver.
1312  * Alert data[7:0] contains the port ID, and data[15:8] contains a flag
1313  * indicating whether the port is load-balanced (1) or directed (0).
1314  */
1315  DLB_ALERT_CQ_WATCHDOG_TIMEOUT,
1316 } dlb_alert_id_t;
1317 
1321 typedef struct {
1323  dlb_alert_id_t id;
1325  uint64_t data;
1326 } dlb_alert_t;
